title: Bake Sale
description: Billy's bike is broken! What will Billy do to solve his problem? In Bake Sale, students will learn about problems and solutions through an adorable story about friends helping each other. This book can also be used to teach students how to retell and to use quotation marks correctly.
reviewWords: bake sale, broken, fixed, tarts, treats, upset
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Determine problem and solution
awareness: Long Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate long vowel /a/ sound
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize and use quotation marks
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
